remarks.format:
## Remarks O <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement> classe é a classe base para as seguintes classes, que correspondem aos elementos definidos a [especificação de gramática de reconhecimento de fala (SRGS) versão 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761):
- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>
- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag>
- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>
- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>
- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag>
- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken>
Herdam de duas classes adicionais de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement> e representar o texto contido dentro de classes listadas acima (SrgsText) e o reconhecimento de correspondência de modos (SrgsSubset):
- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSubset>
- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText>
